parameters.name: FileSystemId
parameters.description: The ID of the file system.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return.

Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.

Valid values: 1 to 100.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the data retrieval task. Valid values:

*   active: The task is running.
*   canceled: The task is canceled.
*   completed: The task is completed.
*   failed: The task has failed.

parameters.name: StorageType
parameters.description:
The storage class.

*   InfrequentAccess: the Infrequent Access (IA) storage class.
*   Archive: the Archive storage class.

>  If the StorageType parameter is not specified, data retrieval tasks of all types are returned.
